sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import project from "../../studio/schemas/project" import sanityClient from "../client" const Project = () => { const [projectData, setProjectData] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { sanityClient .fetch( `*[_type == "project"]{ title, date, place, description, projectType, link, tags }` ) .then((data) => setProjectData(data)) .catch(console.error) }, []) return (

My Projects

Welcome to my projects page!

{project.title}

) } export default Project
